description: Eventbrite enables organizers to plan, promote, and manage events, selling tickets and providing attendee tools for conferences, concerts, and gatherings

capabilities.name: EVENTBRITE_GET_EVENT_CATEGORIES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve event categories. Use when selecting a category for an event. Localizes results via optional locale parameter.

capabilities.name: EVENTBRITE_GET_EVENT_FORMATS
capabilities.description: Tool to list event formats. Use when you need the available formats before creating or updating an event.

capabilities.name: EVENTBRITE_GET_EVENT_SUBCATEGORIES
capabilities.description: Tool to list all event subcategories. Use when fetching available subcategory options, optionally filtered by locale after selecting a category.
